ISSUE.TITLE: [UIDT improvements] Rating/ checkbox as LTAR/ Lookup
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v14.18.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** Database: **sqlite3** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.90.11** - Set rating field as primary; LTAR should show rating icons configured - Lookup to rating field should be read-only; currently allowed to edit in UI - data persists till reload ![Screenshot 2022-05-14 at 6 55 54 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/86527202/168427829-a360be75-9eaf-4e29-a98d-0a9201e8a72e.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #2326 from nocodb/fix/2242-hm-list-pagination fix: hasmany pagination - api correction

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: make rating readonly in lookup column re #2045 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
fix: make rating readonly in lookup column (#2340) re #2045 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
